mapper.select: SELECT storeNo FROM ( SELECT store_no AS storeNo FROM Store WHERE store_floor = #{Floor} ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM() ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TODAY_STORE(today_store_no, store_no, today_store_dt) VALUES (today_store_seq.NEXTVAL, #{floor}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT distinct (store_no) FROM today_store WHERE TRUNC(today_store_dt) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM today_store WHERE store_no = #{storeNo} AND TRUNC(today_store_dt) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT member_no FROM today_store WHERE store_no = #{storeNo} AND TRUNC(today_store_dt) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)
SELECT store_no AS storeNo, store_brand AS storeBrand, store_floor AS storeFloor, store_img AS storeImg, store_map AS storeMap FROM store WHERE store_no = #{storeNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TODAY_STORE(today_store_no, store_no, today_store_dt, member_no) VALUES (today_store_seq.NEXTVAL, #{storeNo}, SYSDATE, #{memberNo})
mapper.select: SELECT count(today_store_no) FROM today_store WHERE member_no = #{memberNo} AND TRUNC(today_store_dt) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)
SELECT a.store_floor FROM store a INNER JOIN today_store b ON a.store_no = b.store_no WHERE b.member_no = #{memberNo} AND trunc(SYSDATE) = trunc(b.today_store_dt) ORDER BY b.today_store_dt

SELECT t.store_no AS storeNo, s.store_brand AS storeBrand FROM today_store t JOIN store s ON t.store_no = s.store_no AND t.member_no IS NULL AND TRUNC(t.today_store_dt) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) ORDER BY storeNo ASC

SELECT today_store_no AS todayStoreNo, store_no AS storeNo, today_store_dt AS todayStoreDt, member_no AS memberNo FROM today_store WHERE member_no IS NOT NULL AND TRUNC(today_store_dt) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)
